All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AnimationComponent
Component for managing animations of a graphical object using sprite sheet.
AnimationComponent.ACTION
Enum representing the possible actions of the animation.
AnimationSystem
System that handles animations.
Camera
Represents the camera used to control the viewport and rendering of the game.
Component
Abstract class for components.
Debug
Represents the debug overlay used to display game information during debugging.
Entity
Base class for all entities.
EntityManager
 
Game
Main class of the game.
GameLoop
The game loop.
GameplayComponent
Component for managing gameplay-related data and actions.
GameplaySystem
This class is responsible for the gameplay logic.
GraphicComponent
Component for base graphic (can be extended for animation @see AnimationComponent).
GraphicSystem
System that handles the rendering of the entities
HUD
Heads-up display
InputComponent
Component for managing input-related data and actions.
InputSystem
This class is responsible for handling user input.
InventoryComponent
Component for managing inventory-related data and actions.
InventorySystem
System that handles the inventory.
Item
Base class for all items.
Item.ItemType
Enum for item types.
LayersComponent
Component for managing map-related data and actions.
Light
Class that handles the light effect.
Main
Main class that launches the game.
MapEntity
Entity for managing map-related data and actions.
Mob
Base class for all mobs.
MovementSystem
System that handles the movement of the entities
NPC
Base class for all NPCs.
NPCMenu
Class representing the NPC menu.
PhysicComponent
Component for managing physics-related data and actions.
PhysicSystem
The PhysicSystem class handles collision detection and resolution for entities in the game.
Player
Base class for the player.
Projectile
Base class for all projectiles.
Projectile.ProjectileType
Enum for projectile types.
StatsComponent
Component for managing stats-related data and actions.
StatsSystem
System that handles the stats of the entities.
System
Abstract class for systems.
SystemManager
Class that manages the systems.
Timer
A simple timer class that runs a callback after a specified duration.
TransformComponent
Component for managing position-related data and actions.
Utils
A class containing utility methods.
Vector2f
A simple 2D vector class.
